_header: Who seeketh the renown to have
_description: Who would be famed for virtue, let him earn it by virtuous deeds — one cross-rhymed quatrain

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Who sekyth the renoune to haveand eke the prayse of virtuus
                    nameOf wisdoms ways he ought to craveWithe gladsom will to work the
                    same
DULCosViii9.Note:
Added to left margin, sideways, lines running bottom to
                    top.
